experience.description:
Worked as Team Lead, Project Manager, SCRUM Master.
During 13 years I am Team Lead. I worked in division Rosemount Tank Radar (RTR) Sweden.
-Scrum Master last 4 years (Scrum, Agile, TFS, DevOps, Jira).
-Team included 15 members from different countries: 6 soft developers (Russia, USA, Sweden), 3 device developers (USA, Sweden), 6 testers (Russia, India, USA, Sweden). Project Owner (USA), Project Manager (Sweden). 
-Web development (Frontend, Backend, PHP, CSS, HTML).
-Develop automatic tests using Appium.
-Develop DD (device descriptions) for different kinds of transmitters (Pressure, Temperature, Flow, Wireless, Level) for different hosts (AMS, 475, Trex, PACTware, Reference Run-Time Environment, Rosemount Radar Master, Instrument Inspector, Siemens PDM, SDC-625, Yokogawa Field Mate) for different communication protocols (HART, FF, Wireless) using language EDDL.
-Convert DD to DTM, work with PowerShell, FDI packages, DD-IDE Studio, FF Studio
-Our projects contain more then more then 100 screens with more then 200 variables, contain more then 60 methods, different alerts.
-During developing DD use Clear Case, Clear Quest, DOORS, Visual Studio, FDI Package IDE,Cisco Jabber Web Ex Meeting, Remote Desktop Connection for communication.
